testimonial.en:
Infinitely grateful to CryptoShalix for his love, delivery of his gifts, respect, listening, generosity and his friendship.

I have had the pleasure of receiving at least three readings or conversations with my soul through its channels. And each one has been a discovery and an advance in my spiritual and personal path.
The way of channeling of CryptoShalix is very special, like a journey into the interior of my psyche, with images and ways to enter my records, which in turn change as I change.
Just that, the entry to the channeling, is a lot of information. What is my door like, what character speaks to CryptoShalix to answer my questions, etc.
It has been very interesting to do several readings spread over time to see all those changes.

Regarding the questions I asked and their answers, I could write several pages. In summary, I will say that all the answers were of incredible wisdom and finesse. Affirming or denying things that clarified my path a lot. And with specific advice and useful guidelines specific to my case.

The veracity of his channelings is beyond doubt, because on more than one occasion he told me about things that he personally could not know, and that I had never told him.
With this I mean that CryptoShalix really puts aside his personality and his ego to transmit a direct message from me higher self. For my greatest good and that of all beings.

In addition, his incredible capacity for empathy makes the sessions very loving and he always seeks to explain things to me in different ways, thus achieving the difficult task of translating. from the astral or channel from other higher planes to concrete words from this material world, and from our rational understanding.

CryptoShalix is really the guardian of the bridge between two worlds.
Thank you friend ‚ôëÔ∏èüêê

testimonial.es:
CryptoShalix realiz√≥ un taller muy interactivo e interesante donde nos llev√≥ desde los comienzos de la econom√≠a humana hasta el funcionamiento de las criptomonedas, utilizando la narraci√≥n, el teatro y el debate grupal.

Un tema que pocas veces hubiera siquiera dedicado mi tiempo a estudiar, pudimos no s√≥lo entenderlo en un par de horas, si no pasarlo genial y divertirnos.

La capacidad de CryptoShalix de explicar, su pasi√≥n y su conocimiento profundo del mundo de la econom√≠a y la inform√°tica no dejan de sorprenderme.
Hasta casi me convence de pasarme a las criptomonedas jaja

Bromas a parte, un tema tan importante y de actualidad consigui√≥ que un grupo bastante profano en el asunto, lo entendiera y adem√°s disfrutara. Uniendo as√≠ este tema actual con toda la historia de la humanidad y su complicado rompecabezas de la econom√≠a. Con lo cual terminamos en un debate filos√≥fico muy interesante y necesario. Conocer para entender y despu√©s trascender.

De lo concreto y material de la econom√≠a y el dinero digital a lo abstracto y trascendental del equilibrio del dar y el recibir.

As√≠ fue √©ste taller, que recomiendo a todo el mundo, pues es b√°sico para el mundo que vivimos y nos concierne a todos. Ojal√° CryptoShalix como profesor cuando estudiaba ciencias sociales.

Maravillada con tu maestr√≠a que has demostrado en √©ste taller, que de nuevo une a la perfecci√≥n los diferentes mundos, desde el juego y el teatro.

Gracias
testimonial.en:
CryptoShalix held a very interactive and interesting workshop where he took us from the beginnings of the human economy to the functioning of cryptocurrencies, using storytelling, theater and group discussion.

A topic that I would rarely have even dedicated my time to to study, we were able to not only understand it in a couple of hours, but also have a great time and have fun.

CryptoShalix's ability to explain, his passion and his deep knowledge of the world of economics and computing never cease to surprise me.
He even almost convinced me to switch to cryptocurrencies haha

Jokes aside, such an important and current topic managed to get a group that was quite profane on the subject to understand it and also enjoy it. Thus uniting this current topic with the entire history of humanity and its complicated puzzle of economics. With which we end up in a very interesting and necessary philosophical debate. Know to understand and then transcend.

From the concrete and material of the economy and digital money to the abstract and transcendental of the balance of giving and receiving.

This was this workshop, which I recommend to everyone world, since it is basic for the world we live in and concerns us all. I wish CryptoShalix as a teacher when he studied social sciences.

Amazed with your mastery that you have demonstrated in this workshop, which once again perfectly unites the different worlds, from play and theater.

Thank you

testimonial.es:

Thank you very much my dear CryptoShalix

testimonial.en:
I met CryptoShalix through a friend and upon learning about her abilities and given that he inspired a lot of confidence in me from the beginning, I wanted to try one of her sessions, without actually having any further details on what it was really like.

I can say that I was very surprised by the certainty of many things said...
And even more so, when I did it, how what was explained could guide me and allow me to see so clearly what was stopping me in my professional and personal development.
